description: Worked as part of an internal team in the Alexa Organization. Developed an email reminder system that followed up with developers on a consistent basis to update outdated feature launch status information. System was developed using Java and utilized various AWS technologies. Emails were generated using Apache Velocity template engine.
bullets: Designed and implemented reminder system that ensures thousands of feature launch statuses are up to date by alerting developers of outdated data on a weekly cadence, saving the Project Management team hours of manual labor a week.
Reminder system aggregates all outdated data into a single spreadsheet and persists it to Amazon S3 for consumption by the Project Management team.
Provided an economic and scalable solution by utilizing Step Functions, Lambdas and other serverless AWS technologies.
Presented project design to senior engineers and stakeholders for their sign off on implementation strategy and fulfillment of requirements.
takeAway: Software Development is not just programming, it's building readable, maintainable and extensible code
